Reviews.Title: “Served a purpose”
Reviews.Author: RV4Pilot
Reviews.Content: booked belgravia mews hotel via late meet family prior flying holiday pushed time reduced night £80 including breakfast deal hence booked deal – key reception located hotel door met efficient staff adjoining restaurant popular shown 50m street overpowering stale smell badly stained carpet bed appeared clean tap bathroom wet cubicle broken sprayed shower tuning light bathroom flickered partly hanging mounting safety hazard furniture fittings broken walls marked stained paintwork damp mildew patch ceiling door handle outside loose screw fingers stop coming hand start bother breakfast plus location 200m victoria stations bus rail tube bed clean provide nights sleep isnt deal weve late difficult original price shown booked justified recommend hotel using

Reviews.Author: rakeevil
Reviews.Content: difficult review booked hotel hurriedly london staying night via late read reviews oh dear started panic rang late hopefully cancel due negative reviews laterooms straight onto called five minutes manager tomorrow paying didnt stay blamed poor husband ear bashing day decided check ourselves firstly arrived notice front door check tophams hotel 28 instead 50 annoyed walked stand chance especially walked tophams lovely bright clean shiny reception negatively checked belgravia mews told tophams booked upgraded price honestly husbands shoulders lift foot relief happily 4 basement door pleasant surprise considering getting closer inspection bad odour shower lights hugh bath shower attachment bath taps sealing grouting missing bathroom chips woodwork carpet clean mattress soft sunk middle air conditioning mind own remember bargain price including breakfast complaining probably morning remember noise people walked reception didn’t lay job noticed milk english tea hospitality tray ventured breakfast english breakfast luckily included price upgraded heard enquire cooked breakfast waitress obviously yes thank goodness declined breakfast buffet style run eggs bacon rest kept warm efficient chaffing tins danish pastries excellent probably stick continental breakfast summary middle london grateful upgrade despite maintenance issues reason am publishing hotels warn pay hotel downfalls try upgrade staying belgravia mews fault stay staff polite smell issue notice overall ok wouldn’t pay top hotel

Reviews.Content: honestly worst hotel stayed sleeping street list goes wrong broken toliet flush bin main phone connected wifi information pack ripped carpet wallpaper hanging chipped paint ripped carpets dirty bed sheets dirty curtains extra pillows smelled bad sounds currently trying money complaint acknowledged people involved resolve issue stay

Reviews.Content: dont normally write reviews feel review placei therapist hotel ive lucky stayed luxury hotels world granted ive stayed cheapo ones soooo initially worried staying wed booked reading reviews mum booked dad paying shopping london pleasant surprise hotel fab location near victoria station close proximity lots attractions mews 3 lovely clean modern oversized bath walk shower nice telly tea coffee facilities complimentary safe fridge staff lovely helpful times maybe lucky sometimes treating wish treated yourself clean friendly stay rate london dont negative reviews book 0

Reviews.Title: “OK if you just need a place to sleep in a good location”

Reviews.Content: fair excellent rate 62 pounds night location near victoria station close sights ok furnishings decent bed reasonably comfortable bed look elsewhere business booked location supposedly free wireless internet phone television trying figure lamps finally realized didnt light bulb customer service pretty terrible werent rude necessarily laughably incompetent friend tried contact picked phone
